lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Kiva has allowed me to be more directly involved with those in need and I find the experience very rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I trade and invest in the stock market.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I like helping people in need. "Love is Love's reward"

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I been given opportunies in my life. I feel the need to provide that to others...
lender.occupational_info: Doing all I can to help my students love the process of discovery, and tolerate risk.

lender.name: Nicole, Dan & Mackenzie
lender.loan_because: We love.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: One must feed the soul whenever one is not at his best.
lender.occupational_info: Sharing information and experience.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Altruism of course :P

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe in the good this site is accomplishing.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because:
emailed to my sister after she sent me a second kiva gift certificate....-" thanks again for the gc. it was a bright point in my day today to use it. here is where it went. i like her smile."
her response- "my only concern, (sometimes) is that people have the idea - that "we're helping them" (the poor people) based on economic position. and in reality, we help each other...."
so so true.................---in reality we help each other---
thanks, Kiva people, for letting us

lender.name: Hector & Ana
lender.loan_because: we loan because everybody in this word need that chance, that motivation to succeed with their own efforts.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Success is a feeling best shared.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves development of business management software. I enjoy helping small business owners to better manage and become more successful.

lender.name: Pedro Coelhas
lender.loan_because: I think I can make a difference...
lender.occupational_info: I work in the electricity regulation in the financial area...

lender.name: Carolyn & Sigi
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach facial exercises to look younger as a natural alternative to invasive medical practices

lender.name: Jansen
lender.loan_because: I dont have a lot of money, but i can afford it. I did start for my self in February 2007,and there was not anyone who would help me out. But i did get a banking loan so it worked out for me. I WANT to help others.There are soo many gooood workers out there newer getting a chanse for them selfs and there famelies.That too bad. Thanks to KIVA making it possibel for all..................................
lender.occupational_info: Im making roof.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: sharing is caring.
lender.occupational_info: I work with all types of children, because they are the future, yet they are the most vulnerable.

lender.name: Sajin
lender.loan_because: it feels good to be of help

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: i really want to.
lender.occupational_info: my work is a room with a view, basically, and i appreciate the opportunity you have provided to be helpful.

lender.name: Familien Franke
lender.loan_because: This is the most direct way to see the difference, when You make a contribution. A help to help Your-self. The first start is allways the hardest. We hope our lending makes it a jumstart.
lender.occupational_info: Tonny is an experiences software-developer, currently working with SAP-XI technology. Mona is doing sales and marketing in the Automobile bussiness. Celine is going to school and doing gymnastics as sport.

lender.name: Paul & Claudia
lender.loan_because: This gives us a direct way to have a positive impact on others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in organizations work more effectively.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: Why not, it's the right thing to do

lender.name: John W.
lender.loan_because: I believe in investing in human potential resources for the upbuilding of humankind with the ultimate hope for world peace.
lender.occupational_info: Educator activist for restorative justice with equity, forgiveness and love. More information about me on Facebook - John W. Eyster.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses reach their customers online.

lender.name: Lawrence & Laurie
lender.loan_because: Simply put, it's the right thing to do. We have had a satisfying and successful life so far, so giving others the same opportunity as we have had is the only way to live your life. We hope that others would be just as compassionate and understanding if the shoe were on the other foot.
lender.occupational_info:
Lawrence works for a large North American communications company, as part of a team who monitors the computer networks for intrusion or other security threats.
Laurie works as a teller for a large national bank.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I like to help things grow and to help people make their own success
lender.occupational_info: Finding people with great ideas and the passion and ability to make them real

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: this is the way that development and empowerment should be conducted, locally and by those in the community.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.occupation: Case Manager for Families and Youth

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune.

lender.name: Nuno Almeida
lender.loan_because: ... Acredito em ti ... ... I believe in you ... ... Creo en ti ...
lender.occupational_info: Comunidade Kiva.org de lingua Portuguesa.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help others achieve their dreams of entrepreneurship and financial independence!
lender.occupational_info: We design the accredited continuing education for medical professionals to maintain their licensure.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: KIVA donation was a gift to me and I'd like to continue lending when my loan has been repaid to assist women starting or expanding a business.
lender.occupational_info: I want to assist women to become more independent.

lender.name: Dewitt & Lynette
lender.loan_because: We love helping people who want to help themselves!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can be successful and happy given the opportunity. Those of us who have been given that opportunity are obliged to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a data network that allows people to share information across several continants.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Kathy & Fred
lender.loan_because: we are interested in helping the less fortunate persons of the world; especially those who are interested in helping themselves.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I love to see people use their own initiatives to change their lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I look for interesting business projects and build companies around them. We are currently building a Biodiesel production facility.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: These individuals are in a position to know how they can make their own lives and the lives of their families and neighbours better. It's the idea that the loan is going directly to a real person who will benefit and pass on the benefit to their communities that is so appealing.
lender.occupational_info: I make stained glass panels and jewellery from my own studio. I'm very lucky to be able to be creative and do what I enjoy so much - and that others are willing to pay me to do it.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: As the child of an immigrant to the United States, I am fortunate to have been able to have gotten a great education and to make a good living. I want to be able to make loans to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to design information systems and processes to help gather financial and management information for a global company.

lender.name: T.S.
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need, and because without the help of others I would not be where I am now.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university and help students get the most out of their education.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel connected to other people when I help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11 and 12 year old students in a city school in Dallas, Tx.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I manage a commercial printing company

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I'm a lucky person and I believe it's my responsibility to be involved and to share. I am very interested in meeting new people and learning from their experiences.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my provincial government to help make our laws as fair as possible and to help make the laws easy to find and understand for everyone.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Giitra gitra, isiir ilwaad
lender.occupational_info: I teach environmental science in the Hudson River valley.

lender.name: joakim
lender.loan_because: it helps people

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate because of the opportunities that have been given to me in my life. I have traveled all around the world, and I know that a little can go a long way. I especially have a connection with Peru.
lender.occupational_info: I research and plan tours to South America for a large US tour operator. We send groups of travelers on tours which I help design. I want to use hotels, restaurants, shops etc. that are locally owned so that the benefit from incoming tourism dollars can stay in the local community as much as possible. We also send our travelers to visit and support projects which help children. I believe tourism is a very powerful tool for creating understanding and peace.

lender.name: John and Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Anne teaches French at the local high school. That is children 15 to 18 years old. John helps people use their computer systems more effectively.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: people need it and I can. I can only hope that one day the world will be perfect and we wont need kiva!! :-), but until then......
lender.occupational_info: fun

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: stay at home wife and mom

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have cancer or bleeding disorders.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe "a little" by American standards goes a long way in many other places in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children the basics in education, and travel to countries in need whenever possible.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I enjoy reading about these entrepreneurs because here in the USA we have the same problem getting money for our own businesses. I like seeing businesses grow so they can hire other people to help them work in their business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell insurance protection to help a family even if the entrepreneur dies or is hurt and not able to work.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to whatever I can to make the world a better place, and to give hope and encouragement to these people I see here, trying to work hard to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital.

lender.name: SHERI
lender.loan_because: Oprah said so! Makes sense to me
lender.occupational_info: Secretarial, sitting at a desk all day working on the phones and computer.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: ...there are no Pan-Asian Supermarkets down in hell, so you can't buy Golden Boy peanuts.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: the gifts God has given me need to be shared with others and not kept to myself.
lender.occupational_info: Just getting ready for our first child!

lender.name: Anonymous
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: as i have traveled i have recived help from people i did not know and they ask for not a thing in return.

lender.name: Janine & Family
lender.loan_because: My family, and I, were blessed to be born in a prosperous country and to financially comfortable families. I have always been aware of the random good luck we were all afforded and I think it is very important to give back to others less fortunate. Kiva is the perfect way to do this. It is also wonderful that my children can be involved in helping other families around the world. This is a great tool to help the children learn "gratitude" for what they have and "be of service" to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I LOVE being a mother! This is the most important and precious job I'll ever have. My hope is that my two daughters grow up with strong self-esteem and that they are solid world citizens that live purposeful lives. I also have a passion for environmentalism. I work at reducing our families' consumption and work toward being more environmentally responsible.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software to help courts do their work more efficiently.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me as an individual to empower people that want a better life for themselves and their loved ones.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I like to give women around the world the resources to raise their families standard of living. By lending them the money to run a business, it will help their daughters and sons have a good life.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an Arts Center where we build community through the arts by offering concerts, classes, art exhibits and theater productions.

lender.name: A Second Chance
lender.loan_because: I believe we all deserve a second chance to better ourselves and the world around us.
lender.occupational_info: I’m a nationally touring teaching artist. What? One who travels 250+ days out of the year to perform (theatre, dance, music), teach those skills to others (pre K - professional), and produce/write music (3 cds to date, hear them here). I’m co-founder of an educational physical theatre company, Creatively Independent, as well as co-founder of an Americana Indie music label, RoadWorm Music. A Second Chance (the company who's proceeds fund my KIVA loans) is an extension of all that inspires me. I find expressive, abandoned/discarded sweaters and imagine their lives. I imagine what they can now become and who might be drawn to it. My different arts have common threads: improvise, enjoy the moment, listen, see the big picture and soak in the details. Recycling, recrafting and supporting charity stores like Goodwill and Salvation Army is how I try and make a difference. I spend most of my time teaching others how to find and express their personal voice.

lender.name: Garth
lender.loan_because: My sister-in-law gave us money to start an account and we enjoy giving other people an opportunity to help their families and others.
lender.occupational_info: We are doing this as a family. I work for a government agency on computer equipment. My wife helps government agencies by providing expert advice. My children in the picture are 8 and 6 years old and are from China.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: it's ethical, it's easy, and it's endorsed by Bill Clinton.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a high school math teacher.

lender.name: PJP
lender.loan_because: We all are neighbors in the world.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: the old fish story, give a man a fish or teach him how to fish. I want to teach, it is also a good teaching tool for my children about the real world, not just their world.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to support those indivuduals with ideas but need financial support to realize them.
lender.occupational_info: Educator

lender.name: Daniel and JoAnn
lender.loan_because: If art can change the world, this may be one way... It is also as a tribute to my late father-in-law who always found enough to share with those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: My artwork generally depicts a world where cultural boundaries are indefinite and time is irrelevant.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I can--it is a small contribution that I can make to help someone else have a better life on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I educate children and adults in public schools

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I'm devoted to equality, social justice, and human rights. I care about the world, people, and as fellow human beings and global citizens we all have the duty to help each other. To me, community empowerment through things like microcredit is the way to improve lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior at Providence College studying Global Studies and Spanish. My plans next year are to volunteer for some time in Latin America, and then I hope to work for some kind of NGO/non-profit that focuses on international development or human rights. I hope to obtain my masters in international relations in a few years.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Part of the money I earn should always go to a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in the 6th grade and play football and baseball.

lender.name: The Jaskwhich Children
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I believe in global citizenship.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university office. My job is to educate students about community standards and how to resolve conflicts.

lender.name: viola
lender.loan_because: we are ONE

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I like

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: We Americans have more than we need, we need to share more with those who do not have as much.
lender.occupational_info: I fly private jet aircraft for owners worldwide. I also am a Real Estate broker.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people escape from the poverty trap. As a citizen in the wealthiest state in the wealthiest nation of the world, it is my responsibility to help others less fortunate. I like helping specific people, and I look forward to hearing from them!

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky to be where I am now and would like to share my good fortune with others who work hard for what they have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a aircraft mechanic for Boeing, I put the wings on the Boeing 747 jetliner.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I was a business person for 40 years and wish to help entrepreneurs in developing countries establish prosperous businesses and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I had a small beauty salon for 40 years and know how much work is involved in running a successful business.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for Christmas and I'm really happy to help a person build a business.
lender.occupational_info: I sell to corporatations the use of movie theatres either for private screenings of movies or corporate presentations.

lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to see people grow.

lender.name: Andy and Andrea
lender.loan_because: A wonderful idea and gift from my brother and his wife. I read in President Clinton's book "Giving" and thought what a wonderful thing that anyone can do.
lender.occupational_info: Transportation of freight all over the world.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: everybody should!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Compared to many, I have so much. This allows me to share with others trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach chemistry in university. I want my students to learn to give time, skills, money, and prayers.

lender.name: Taj
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a happier, more prosperous and peaceful place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hypnotherapist. I employ trance modalitiess to help people with personal problems and goal setting. I also hold a Master's degree in Eastern Philosophy and Literature and study comparative religions.. I believe in the unity of the human family, regardless of what race, creed or nationality we belong to. I am especially interested in supporting women in their small businesses.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: we are all One

lender.name: VICTORIA
lender.loan_because: I’m excited that a small amount of my money can support an entrepreneur and make a big difference in her or his life.
lender.occupational_info: I make art prints with solar plates using just sun and water to imprint an image on the plate. Most of my prints are inspired by nature.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: "We are one."

lender.name: Valdeci
lender.occupation: Finance Coordinator and teacher at night

lender.name: Evert
lender.loan_because: Reaching out a helping hand to entrepreneurship and business development of small business will help the direct recipients and the community at large. In particular, Kiva provides a new financing tool that was not available before and will result in a major ripple effect. I'm really happy to be part of that change.
lender.occupational_info: I was a consultant before. I returned back to school and will work in financial industry.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: i have been there. Yo he estado alli.
lender.occupational_info: carpentry. carpentero

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people

lender.name: Caryl
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves and to make the world a better place for all families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a local hospital to meet he nutritional needs of patients.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Improving life through an education which prepares children for an interdependent, multi cultural, fast changing world.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: "The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit." -Nelson Henderson

lender.name: Surfmerchants
lender.loan_because: My company donates in the names of each of our employees and our clients to a charity of their choosing. Why do they loan? Because they really are good people who believe that their success should be shared with others, both near and far.
lender.occupational_info: We designed a web-based application that a good majority of the mystery shopping industry uses to function. It covers all aspects of the process, from finding shoppers to evaluate the businesses to reporting packages that compile the data into a usable format for the ultimate end client.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: One day I'd like to see a world without extreme poverty or destitution. This is my small contribution.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I expect to pass through life but once. If therefore, there be any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again. ~William Penn
lender.occupational_info: I provide industrial generators to hospitals, townships and various corporations. I am also a history and political science major who spends weekends volunteering with the USO and community based organizations.

lender.name: Norman & Kathy
lender.loan_because: We are children of God, and God loves a cheerful giver. God has blessed us so that we may bless others in His name.

lender.name: Krystle
lender.loan_because: we all need help getting started, and I feel blessed that I can join my money with others to help give others an opportunity to support themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I drive ambulances and take care of people during emergencies. I have taken 4 full years of schooling to get trained.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: On the global scale, I am doing very very well and it is only right to help others get a leg up.
lender.occupational_info: From Wikipedia: Patent examiners review patent applications to determine whether they should become a patent, this includes searching patent and scientific literature databases for prior art, and substantively examining patent applications, that is examining whether the claimed invention meets the patentability requirements such as novelty, "non-obviousness", "utility" and sufficiency of disclosure.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do, plus, it's fun!

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference for families in need
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners to have more impact in their communities

lender.name: Jess
lender.loan_because: When so little can make such a difference - there is no other choice.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Business Coach. A large part of my work, through a contract with a local CED organization, "Momentum", is coaching Immigrants and the underemployed in my community through the start up and initial operation of their own micro-business.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make such a large difference and, because we are fortunate, we should share that with others...
lender.occupational_info: Developing strategies for healthy and vibrant communities. Nurturing public-private-grassroots partnerships for market transformations. http://www.linkedin.com/in/martintull

lender.name: Jed and Jude
lender.loan_because: It's cool to help people who are trying to make their life better. What little blessings we can share is always something for those who are in need. We hope we can positively impact someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a student in High School and my little brother is in the 4th Grade. Currently I am also working to finish an Associate Degree in Arts in an Early College Program. We like to play football and are also active in AWANA Club at our local church. During vacation time we travel to see other places and it is sad to learn that some people are really in need. My parents talked to me about Kiva and we are glad that we can make a difference in somebody else's life. Hopefully I can save more out of my school allowance to fund my involvement with Kiva. My parents promised me to match every dollar I save when that savings is used to help others.

lender.name: Luc
lender.loan_because:
We live in a connected world where the divide between the haves and have-nots cannot be ignored or tolerated. Thanks to Kiva, cost-effective ways to share even the smallest part of one's earnings has never been easier and more satisfying.
As would be the case in a garden, this site enables us to share our seeds to help out those seeking to grow for themselves. This isn't just a loan, it's the sharing of empowerment.

lender.name: Polly & Neil
lender.loan_because: we want to help someone
lender.occupational_info: Polly is an analyst in the Finance Department at a major hospital and Neil has recently retired from Government service

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Being fortunate enough to have disposable income I would like to put it to some good use in the world.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I would not have been successful without someone helping me.
lender.occupational_info: I grow corn and soybeans for a living in the fertile soils of the Midwestern United States.

lender.name: Eric & Ann
lender.loan_because: We want to share our prosperity and good fortune with others. We want to make up for some of the recent misadventures of our government by showing that some Americans remain concerned about the welfare of average people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy working with students in a multi-cultural environment

lender.name: Cassedy
lender.loan_because: I care and want everyone to have a chance. I feel so lucky that I can be able to help and I've been with Kiva since 5th grade.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an 15 year old student. I'm in 9th grade.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I plan parties, events, conferences and festivals. My most recent project was an international choral festival which brought singers from around the world to my hometown.

lender.name: MJS
lender.loan_because: I hope to help educate children.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help people around the world. I'm not a rich man, but I can help in some small way to enable people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I perform the daily care and feeding of airliners and airline passengers.

lender.name: armando jorge
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: :) ask me justiceiro_6@hotmail.com

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and now I am able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell collectible coins and currency

lender.name: Katie and Kelsey
lender.loan_because: We like knowing that we can make a difference in the world.

lender.name: JVF
lender.loan_because: "To born, to die, to reborn yet again and progress continuously - this is the path".

lender.name: Steve & Jen
lender.loan_because: we are able, and that's what those that are able should do.
lender.occupational_info: Steve works at testing electronics for quality and Jennifer is a homemaker raising our children.

lender.name: Cait
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly fortunate to be living where I am and to have two parents that both have well paying jobs. I think it is only right to help people who need it, since I am able to.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: my fiance and I are giving each other gifts of experience rather than of things. He will have hours of joy investing and reinvesting in peoples' lives around the world.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: My day job is an Electrical Engineer working on the design on Wind Farm projects and Industrial sites.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: sandy
lender.loan_because: I believe in Jesus Christ who is no respector of class or position in life, we are all one in this world and should share what God has given us, all is owned by him.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate the flow of people who need things with people who can help them with their needs.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
I don't have the resources to make big changes in the world. In the US, I'm actually considered poor. But Kiva is an opportunity to make real changes in a person's quality of life. Every time I make a loan, I feel like I'm helping the world become a better place. Some people can make anything happen, if just given the chance. For the price of a pizza and beer I can help give someone the chance to make their dreams come true, to truly change their life. And when the loan is repayed, it gives me faith that people around the world are honorable.
Little things do make a big difference in the world. It doesn't have to be a loan. It can be letting another car turn in front of you or stopping to pick up a discarded plastic bottle on the sidewalk and disposing of it properly. Karma. Small insignificant acts of kindness add up and become a movement when more people get involved.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a biologist.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The opportunity to make a difference in people's lives is the key to why I enjoy providing loans. The simplicity of this organization is a great idea and one I'm proud to be a part of.
lender.occupational_info: I lead the operations of a consulting organization for a software company. I work from a home office.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: Having been homeless at one point in my life and living in the streets I know what its like not to have your basic needs. I want to help out others so they dont have to experience the same as I did.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It's fun to watch the entrepreneurs progress and feel like you have helped.
lender.occupational_info: I have a carpet cleaning business that also cleans furniture and persian/oriental rugs.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their teeth.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I paint backgrounds for cartoons.

lender.name: Marc & Nikki Shank
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel so good to be able to help a little in this unfair world.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired and we volunteer at the local Hospital and Boy Scouts as Merit Badge teachers. We enjoy travel everywhere golf and just working on our home.

lender.name: Warren
lender.loan_because: Feels great!

lender.name: Peter Pappas
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Helping teachers do their best.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: This is such a unique way to make a personal contribution to someone's success in life. Putting a face or faces on the people receiving the loans gives me a sense of being some small part of their lives.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I work in a children's health clinic.

lender.name: Kirsta
lender.loan_because: Financial empowerment for women speaks volumes!
lender.occupational_info: I teach instrumental music in schools and privately.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help other people help themselves via hard work thru KIVA's micro-loans.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in the area of music recording and Internet gaming.

lender.name: Aftab & Talat
lender.loan_because: We all need to give back to society and make the world better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: how could I not?
lender.occupational_info: recent anthropology grad

lender.name: Mark & Terry
lender.loan_because: the rewards are so great!
lender.occupational_info: Terry teaches children. Mark teaches Carpentry

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I lived for several years in Indonesia and have especially fond memories of my many weeks spent in Bali enjoying the culture and the people. I am delighted to help to build a business for a woman in Bali. Terima Kasih!
lender.occupational_info: I am a nature and wildlife photographer. I use my photos and inspirational verse to create custom books and greeting cards that use the beauty of nature to encourage people who are facing life and health challenges and to celebrate the happy occasions in their lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and I can share the blessing.

lender.name: a friend
lender.loan_because: I live in a developed nation. I have a job that pays the bills with money left over. $5.00 or even $50.00 will not financially cripple me. People need to stop and realize that giving out a few dollars here and there will not ruin them and in turn, will help someone in need.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: someone needs it
lender.occupational_info: I bake fancy cupcakes in a small downtown shop.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Loving kindness to others we do not know, is the mission we all have been given in this life. We each can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home making web sites for small businesses.

lender.name: Brad Dunshee
lender.loan_because: I believe in becoming a change agent and feel that this model is a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I develop interactive strategies and manage them through to execution. Websites, marketing campaigns, search marketing, etc. I do photography on the side, mostly weddings and events. A percentage of my profits from photography goes to microfinance.

lender.name: Elyse
lender.loan_because: It's important to help others. I'm in a position to help give others a chance to do something with their lives-and by helping them, i get something in return; the knowledge that someone may have had their dreams come true because I contributed to their business! Thanks to my big bro and his generous gift!

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people provide an income for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Selling airplane parts for maintance of aircraft.

lender.name: JTH
lender.loan_because: i can right now.
lender.occupational_info: working with children in a busy urban area.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It is important to help everywhere in the world, not just in my own community and most especially to help the women of these countries succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I basically help people find jobs in the fields of banking and finance.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.occupation: Retired high school counselor and teacher
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves. It's why I also support Heiffer and Women for Women.

lender.name: Cristen
lender.loan_because: I love helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of California, Riverside.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organization called Friends of Honduran Children

lender.name: chelsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life...

lender.name: garth
lender.loan_because: It is an easy responsible way to help provide what is dearly lacking in underpriviledged societies.....capital to help them help theirselves.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: Jesus tells us that to whom much has been given much is required. So it is my duty to lend when the Lord has blessed me and my family so much.
lender.occupational_info: I recently graduated from university and am currently working as an intern for an economic development corporation in Peterborough, Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Alejundro
lender.loan_because: I think is a great idea. I was unsure at the time. It took me a while to sign up but now that I've done it, I'm so excited about it. To be able to help someone out like this is amazing and it's so easy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a call center with over 800 people. My wok group I am responsible for supports business customers and their wireless accounts. They manage anywhere from 5-999 lines of service per account. It's up to me to make sure they know what products are available to our customers and how to troubleshoot them if there are any issues with billing or just how to use the product to make their business more efficient. I've been in my job for over 10 years and it's ever changing. It really is the reason why I love what I do.

lender.name: Holly
lender.occupational_info: i also work as a beach cashier in the summer. i scan beach permits and take money of non permit holders so they can get on the beach. when it rains i read alot during the day because no one goes to the beach.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to give people a hand in expanding their business and to share our good fortune. My wife and I are really happy to be able to participate in this program.
lender.occupational_info: I am an applied scientist. I work in a powerplant. My wife trained as a chef and is now a caterer.

lender.name: Baltimore Family
lender.loan_because: We wish to share our blessings with others around the world.

lender.name: Rena
lender.loan_because: I believe in reciprocity. Much has been given to me. As an African-American woman I have priviliedges that are not afforded to other women. I have the oportunity to do and be anything I want. I am living my dream of working for myself. I want to empower other entrepreneurs to get closer to thier dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save thier homes from foreclosure. I negotiate lenders to come up with an afforable settlement the home-owner can afford. I have a 97% success rate.

lender.name: Genet
lender.loan_because: I love to be part of the Kiva team that stands for a noble cause. It is also wonderful to be able to help those who work hard to make their life better.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy what I do. I like to reach out to whose who are in need. I give as I have received from others when I needed help. God bless you all.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Because we have it too easy. People in the developing areas of India literally cook the circuit boards out of our old, "recycled" computers and electronics. They breath in all of these chemicals and they are killing themselves. Not only do adults do this but kids do it to. They have to do it to be able to make a small living, big enough to buy food. The river that runs through their town is called the Black River because that is what it is. It lights on fire several times a year. But we can stop this. Using Kiva and other programs we can help these people live a better, heather, more civilized life. I loan because there is more to life than stuff and things. Because there are people in this world other than me. Because it feels good to help one another and because they need the help.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: This is a great way of empowering people without creating dependency! Charity is wonderful, but this is better, because it enables people to use the skills and talents they already have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying international development and economics.

lender.name: Sally and Lauren
lender.loan_because: Lauren and I want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Mom and daughter. IT and student

lender.name: Isabella
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity for so many people! Every little thing can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, but once I'm finished with school I hope to do human rights work, and this is a wonderful way to start that dream.

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others live.
lender.occupational_info: I love on people in Jesus' name.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: People helping people, that's what it's about. This is a simple way to make a difference in someone's life, by helping them become self-sufficient for years to come, and help those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician looking for ways to help other people. I play acoustic guitar and write music for others as well.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the ability to contribute their talents to a greater degree.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to improve homes for better energy efficiency.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Humboldt State University. I knit hats and scarves to make spending money

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in the world

lender.name: Jesse and Georgia
lender.loan_because: People are nice.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person to make the world a better place with God's help.
lender.occupational_info: My career has been in service of students with disabilities and their families.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.occupational_info: I help people work for justice on issues such as education and health care

lender.name: Crystal & Christina
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives around the world in a sustainable and meaningful way

lender.name: NTFM
lender.loan_because: We are the employees of a small cafe in Orlando, FL. We sell sandwiches and smoothies to provide for our families. We lend through Kiva to help others provide for theirs.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I was looking for a more personal way to help people than generic large charities. Kiva is a fantastic way to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan so they can avoid, prevent or lessen the impact of a crisis situation.

lender.name: Angi
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people become home owners.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I'm taking a chance this isn't a scam.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help others in worse economic conditions but with the same good ideas

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lender.occupational_info: Mobile Telecommunications.

lender.name: Debbi
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much and I want to help extend an opportunity to others to expand their business. My parents and others in my life have believed in me and encouraged me to pursue my dreams and goals, and I want to pass that on to others.

lender.name: Naledi
lender.occupation: Star - that\'s what my name means :)

lender.name: Alyce
lender.loan_because: this process works. It is important to me to be able to make a positive difference in the world. It's such a small amount of money in the world I come from but it can do so much good.
lender.occupational_info: I work with numbers. I keep the financial accounts of my company.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Change begins with the individual.

lender.name: Cate
lender.loan_because: Whatever is shared multiplies.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: I work in computer software. I like working with the technology and solving problems that businesses need help solving.

lender.name: Jeff & Barbara
lender.occupation: Jeff is IT Professional, Barbara is a teacher.
lender.loan_because: We loan as a way to help people in a personal way to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Barbara is a second grade teacher. Jeff is an IT professional

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
I believe that charity where one gets something for nothing is demeaning to the recipient.
When governments get involved, there is bribery, theft, diversion of funds to pet projects, corruption and government control.
Obviously, people, not governments, should take care of children, the aged, and the disabled.
For all others, I believe that the better solution is to help people help themselves, and this organization does just that.
If you lend them something to an individual and they pay it back, it gives them a sense of personal satisfaction which builds their confidence and, in turn, their self-esteem and sense of worth.
As an individual with MS, a paralyzed right side, and confined to a wheelchair for the past 10 years, I have some experience in how the handicapped are treated by others, and how to combat it.
lender.occupational_info: Retired U.S. Army Retired Attorney

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who would stand up and do something....take a risk...stick their neck out a bit. I want to encouage them because through their actions, the whole society around them can be mad e stronger.
lender.occupational_info: First, I help companies understand their existing risk of financial loss from natural catastrophies such as hurricanes and earthquakes. Second, I advise them what they can do about reducing that loss potential other than just buying insurance. Retro-fitting buildings in non-traditional ways is a specialty.

lender.name: Tom of Carlsbad
lender.loan_because: I can help.
lender.occupational_info: For over four decades I was a public administrator with the State of California. Now retired I still wish to be of help, especially to those who have the dignity and strength to provide for themselves and others through small businesses. My wife and I love international travel and have benefited from many such small businesses and so it is my turn to return a benefit to them.

lender.name: Tom and Nancy
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans keep us connected to the world. By sharing what we can, we build bridges.
lender.occupational_info: Tom is a retired tax accountant, Nancy is a retired RN, both still very active in volunteer jobs in their community in Northern California.

lender.name: paris
lender.loan_because: I want to see people in other countries truly being happy with what they are doing. I want families' lives to change. I want mothers to feel that their children will have a better life than they did. I want the world to find a way and connect with one another. Kiva is that way.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending school and I am a young activist. I love to travel and after seeing poverty at such a young age, I felt that it was necessary to help others across the globe.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I don't need any more 'stuff' so I figured that I could help others get stuff that will change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large heavy civil construction projects. Dams, pipelines, reservoirs, sewers, etc.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I feel that even at a young age people should be helping echother. We don't have world peace yet, but this might bring us closer to other cultures. So I loan because i want to be part of the uniting of OUR world

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: This is a practical way to love my neighbor no matter where they are in the world. Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Small business consulting

lender.name: Lauren and Dan
lender.loan_because: We believe in a world where people help each other!
lender.occupational_info: A therapist is someone who helps others work through personal issues. A statistician uses a variety of mathematical skills to manipulate and analyze data.

lender.name: Erinn
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate large meetings, events, congresses, tradeshows, incentive trips for US coporporations and we take them any where in the world. I love what I do, every day is different and challenging.

lender.name: Vanola
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help now and then, and this is how I can help. It is truly the "gift that keeps on giving."
